patthana23.43:1.1_1: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.43:2.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa,
patthana23.43:3.1_1: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
